activities.name: Visit Tivoli Gardens
activities.description: Tivoli Gardens is one of the oldest amusement parks in the world, offering a mix of thrilling rides, beautiful gardens, and live performances.
activities.seasonal_notes: Springtime sees the gardens in full bloom, making it a perfect time to enjoy the park's floral beauty.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and check the schedule for special spring events.

activities.name: Cherry Blossom at Bispebjerg Cemetery
activities.description: Experience the breathtaking sight of cherry blossoms in full bloom at Bispebjerg Cemetery, a local favorite for springtime strolls.
activities.seasonal_notes: The cherry blossoms typically bloom in April, creating a picturesque and serene environment.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early in the morning to avoid crowds and capture the best photos.

activities.name: Copenhagen Spring Jazz Festival
activities.description: This annual festival showcases a variety of jazz performances across multiple venues in the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring marks the start of the festival season in Copenhagen, with jazz music filling the air.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance and explore different venues for a diverse experience.

activities.name: Explore Nyhavn
activities.description: Nyhavn is a vibrant waterfront area known for its colorful buildings, historic ships, and lively atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: The mild spring weather makes it an ideal time to explore the outdoor cafes and restaurants.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a spot at a popular café and enjoy the view.

activities.name: Frederiksberg Garden Picnic
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing picnic in Frederiksberg Garden, a large park with beautiful landscapes and a serene lake.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for outdoor picnics as the weather warms up and flowers bloom.
activities.booking_tips: Prepare your picnic supplies in advance and bring a blanket for comfort.

activities.name: Copenhagen Sakura Festival
activities.description: Held annually in Langelinie Park, this festival celebrates Japanese culture with food stalls, performances, and traditional ceremonies.
activities.seasonal_notes: The festival coincides with the cherry blossom season, adding to the festive atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Check the schedule for specific events and arrive early to participate in workshops.

activities.name: Botanical Garden Visit
activities.description: Explore the extensive collection of plants at the Botanical Garden, featuring greenhouses and themed gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is an ideal time to see the garden's wide variety of plants begin to bloom.
activities.booking_tips: Guided tours are available; check the schedule to join one.

activities.name: Copenhagen Marathon
activities.description: Join or watch the Copenhagen Marathon, a major event attracting runners from around the world.
activities.seasonal_notes: The event takes place in May, benefiting from the cool spring weather.
activities.booking_tips: Register early if participating, and plan your viewing spot along the route.

activities.name: Visit the National Museum of Denmark
activities.description: Discover Danish history and culture through extensive exhibits, including Viking artifacts and royal collections.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring showers make indoor museum visits a pleasant option.
activities.booking_tips: Weekdays are less crowded. Check for any special spring exhibitions.

activities.name: Copenhagen Zoo
activities.description: Home to over 3,000 animals, the Copenhagen Zoo offers a fun and educational experience for visitors of all ages.
activities.seasonal_notes: The longer summer days provide ample time to explore the entire zoo.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online for discounts and check feeding schedules in advance.

activities.name: Roskilde Festival
activities.description: One of Europe's largest music festivals, Roskilde features a diverse lineup of artists and a vibrant atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late June to early July, the festival is a highlight of the Danish summer.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out quickly, so book early and consider camping on-site for the full experience.

activities.name: Beach Day at Amager Strandpark
activities.description: Amager Strandpark is Copenhagen's largest beach, offering sandy shores, swimming areas, and water sports.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer temperatures make it perfect for a refreshing dip in the sea.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a picnic and sunscreen, and check for windsurfing lessons if interested.

activities.name: Canal Tour
activities.description: Explore Copenhagen from the water with a guided canal tour, offering views of iconic landmarks like the Little Mermaid and Christiansborg Palace.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer's clear skies provide the best visibility for sightseeing.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online to secure a spot and bring a hat for sun protection.

activities.name: Copenhagen Jazz Festival
activities.description: A city-wide festival featuring hundreds of jazz concerts in various venues, both indoor and outdoor.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held every July, the festival captures the lively summer spirit of the city.
activities.booking_tips: Check the program for free concerts and consider purchasing a festival pass for multiple events.

activities.name: Tivoli Gardens Summer Nights
activities.description: Experience Tivoli Gardens after dark with live music, fireworks, and illuminated rides.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are magical at Tivoli, with extended opening hours.
activities.booking_tips: Buy a multi-ride ticket for savings if you plan to enjoy many attractions.

activities.name: Street Food at Reffen
activities.description: Reffen is a popular street food market located on the industrial Refshaleøen island, offering diverse international cuisines.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for enjoying food and drinks outdoors with a view of the harbor.
activities.booking_tips: Go with a group to try a variety of dishes and arrive early for a good seat.

activities.name: Visit the Louisiana Museum of Modern Art
activities.description: Located north of Copenhagen, this museum offers stunning modern art exhibits and beautiful views over the Øresund Strait.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer allows visitors to enjoy the museum's sculpture garden and outdoor installations.
activities.booking_tips: Consider a combined train and museum ticket for a convenient trip from Copenhagen.

activities.name: Cycling Tour of Copenhagen
activities.description: Join a guided cycling tour to explore Copenhagen's bike-friendly streets, historic sites, and green spaces.
activities.seasonal_notes: The warm, sunny summer weather makes cycling the ideal way to see the city.
activities.booking_tips: Wear comfortable clothing and book in advance to ensure a spot on a popular tour.

activities.name: Visit the Glyptoteket
activities.description: Explore a collection of ancient and modern art at the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek, including works by Rodin and Degas.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is great for museum visits as the weather cools, offering a cozy retreat.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on a Tuesday for free entry and consider using the audio guide for detailed insights.

activities.name: Copenhagen Cooking & Food Festival
activities.description: A celebration of Nordic cuisine, featuring cooking workshops, gourmet tastings, and food markets.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late August to early September, it's ideal for experiencing seasonal Danish flavors.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase event tickets early, as popular workshops sell out quickly.

activities.name: Autumn Leaves at Frederiksberg Palace Gardens
activities.description: Stroll through the picturesque gardens of Frederiksberg Palace, known for its stunning autumn foliage.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn transforms the gardens into a vibrant tapestry of colors, perfect for photography.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekdays to enjoy a quieter experience and capture the best light in the morning.

activities.name: Copenhagen Art Week
activities.description: A city-wide celebration of contemporary art, featuring exhibitions, performances, and talks across various venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in September, it's a cultural highlight as the city embraces the arts in the fall.
activities.booking_tips: Check the program for free events and guided tours, and plan your itinerary in advance.

activities.name: Carlsberg Brewery Tour
activities.description: Learn about the history of Carlsberg and the beer-making process on a guided tour of the brewery.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a great time to enjoy a cozy indoor activity like a brewery tour.
activities.booking_tips: Book your tour online to ensure availability, and don't miss the tasting session at the end.

activities.name: Halloween at Tivoli Gardens
activities.description: Experience spooky decorations, haunted houses, and special Halloween-themed rides at Tivoli Gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: Tivoli transforms into a Halloween wonderland during October, offering festive fun for all ages.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase your tickets in advance and consider a multi-ride pass for savings.

activities.name: Visit Rosenborg Castle
activities.description: Discover Danish royal history at Rosenborg Castle, home to the crown jewels and beautiful royal gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: The castle provides a warm refuge on crisp autumn days, with fewer crowds than in summer.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase a combined ticket with Amalienborg Palace for a complete royal experience.

activities.name: Kayaking in the Canals
activities.description: Explore Copenhagen from the water on a guided kayaking tour through its historic canals.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers a peaceful time to kayak, with the canals less crowded than in summer.
activities.booking_tips: Wear layers to stay warm and book in advance to ensure a spot on the tour.

activities.name: Visit the Design Museum Denmark
activities.description: Discover Danish design history and innovation at this museum, featuring furniture, fashion, and industrial design.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is perfect for exploring indoor cultural attractions as the city cools down.
activities.booking_tips: Check for temporary exhibitions and visit on a weekday for a quieter experience.

activities.name: Copenhagen Christmas Markets
activities.description: Explore the festive Christmas markets at Tivoli Gardens, Nyhavn, and Højbro Plads, offering holiday treats, crafts, and gifts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect time to enjoy the cozy atmosphere and holiday spirit of Copenhagen's Christmas markets.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekday evenings to avoid weekend crowds and bring cash for small purchases.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Frederiksberg Runddel
activities.description: Enjoy ice skating at this charming outdoor rink located near Frederiksberg Gardens, a winter favorite for locals.
activities.seasonal_notes: The rink is open during the winter months, providing a fun and active way to embrace the cold weather.
activities.booking_tips: Rent skates on-site and dress warmly in layers to stay comfortable.

activities.name: Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek Winter Exhibitions
activities.description: Visit the Glyptotek for its winter exhibitions, featuring a rich collection of sculptures and paintings in a beautiful historic setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is ideal for exploring Copenhagen's museums, offering warmth and cultural enrichment.
activities.booking_tips: Check for special winter exhibitions and free admission days.

activities.name: New Year's Eve Fireworks at Tivoli
activities.description: Celebrate New Year's Eve with a spectacular fireworks display at Tivoli Gardens, a beloved Copenhagen tradition.
activities.seasonal_notes: Tivoli's New Year's celebrations are a highlight of the winter season, drawing locals and tourists alike.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance, as this event sells out quickly, and arrive early for the best view.

activities.name: Bakken Winter Opening
activities.description: Experience the winter season at Bakken, the world's oldest amusement park, with special winter-themed attractions and entertainment.
activities.seasonal_notes: Bakken offers a unique winter experience with festive decorations and seasonal activities.
activities.booking_tips: Check the opening dates and consider a rides pass for access to all attractions.

activities.name: Warm Up at a Copenhagen Café
activities.description: Enjoy a cozy break at one of Copenhagen's charming cafés, such as The Living Room or Café Norden, known for their hygge atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect time to embrace hygge culture, with warm drinks and cozy settings.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during off-peak hours to secure a comfortable spot by the fire.

activities.name: Visit Frederiksborg Castle
activities.description: Explore the grandeur of Frederiksborg Castle, featuring beautiful Baroque architecture and extensive art collections.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter provides a quieter time to visit the castle, with fewer tourists and a serene landscape.
activities.booking_tips: Take a train from Copenhagen and consider a guided tour for in-depth insights.

activities.name: Copenhagen Light Festival
activities.description: Marvel at the art installations and light displays that illuminate the city during the Copenhagen Light Festival.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in February, the festival brightens the long winter nights with stunning visual displays.
activities.booking_tips: Dress warmly and plan your route to see the most iconic installations.

activities.name: Winter Bathing at Helgoland
activities.description: Join the local tradition of winter bathing at Helgoland, a bathing club at Amager Strand, for a refreshing and invigorating experience.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter bathing is a popular Danish activity, believed to boost circulation and mood.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a warm towel and change of clothes, and check club hours for visitor access.
